nodes.text: Dimok forces used the Cargo ferry Delphine during the Sepan Civil War. Delphine aided other Dimok starships in raiding a Ripoblus supply convoy in the beginning of the Imperial Sepan campaign. Intending to drive off the Dimok raiders, Imperial TIE starfighters destroyed the Cargo Ferry Mangonel, among numerous Y-wings, forcing Delphine to retreat to hyperspace.
